SELECT METHOD_NM AS conectMethod , IFNULL(SUM(CREAT_CO),0) AS creatCo , IFNULL(SUM(UPDT_CO),0) AS updtCo , IFNULL(SUM(RDCNT),0) AS inqireCo , IFNULL(SUM(DELETE_CO),0) AS deleteCo , IFNULL(SUM(OUTPT_CO),0) AS outptCo , IFNULL(SUM(ERROR_CO),0) AS errorCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, ((SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-') || (SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2))) AS statsDate
, ((SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-') || ((SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)) || '-') || (SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2))) AS statsDate
, 0 AS statsCo FROM LETTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}
AND SRVC_NM LIKE '%' || '${detailStatsKind}' || '%'
GROUP BY conectMethod, statsDate, statsCo ORDER BY statsDate

SELECT COUNT(CONECT_ID) AS statsCo
, VARCHAR_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, 'YYYY') AS statsDate
, VARCHAR_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS statsDate
, VARCHAR_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS statsDate
, '' AS conectMethod , 0 AS creatCo , 0 AS updtCo , 0 AS inqireCo , 0 AS deleteCo , 0 AS outptCo , 0 AS errorCo FROM LETTNLOGINLOG WHERE 1=1
AND CONECT_ID = #{detailStatsKind}
AND VARCHAR_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} GROUP BY statsDate, conectMethod, creatCo, updtCo, inqireCo, deleteCo, outptCo, errorCo ORDER BY statsDate
